verses.text: \w And|strong="H3254"\w* Elihu \w continued|strong="H3254"\w*:

“Bear \w with|strong="H3803"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H2191"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w*, \w and|strong="H5750"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5750"\w* \w show|strong="H2331"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* there \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w said|strong="H4405"\w* \w on|strong="H4405"\w* God’s behalf.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* get \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1843"\w* \w from|strong="H7350"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w*, \w and|strong="H6664"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w ascribe|strong="H5414"\w* \w justice|strong="H6664"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w Maker|strong="H6466"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w truly|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w are|strong="H5973"\w* \w free|strong="H5973"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w*; \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w* \w in|strong="H8549"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1844"\w* \w is|strong="H8267"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Indeed|strong="H2005"\w*, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w mighty|strong="H3524"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w despises|strong="H3988"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w*; \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w mighty|strong="H3524"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w keep|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w He|strong="H5414"\w* grants \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H1639"\w* \w His|strong="H3808"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w off|strong="H1639"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w He|strong="H3808"\w* enthrones \w them|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* exalts \w them|strong="H3427"\w* \w forever|strong="H5331"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6040"\w* if men \w are|strong="H2256"\w* bound with \w chains|strong="H2131"\w*, \w caught|strong="H3920"\w* \w in|strong="H3920"\w* \w cords|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H2256"\w* \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w*,

\w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w tells|strong="H5046"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w deeds|strong="H6467"\w* \w and|strong="H5046"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w arrogantly|strong="H1396"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* transgressed.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w opens|strong="H1540"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* ears \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w correction|strong="H4148"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* commands \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* iniquity.

If \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w Him|strong="H5647"\w*, \w then|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w end|strong="H3615"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w prosperity|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w happiness|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* if \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w*, \w then|strong="H5674"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w perish|strong="H1478"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w sword|strong="H7973"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w die|strong="H1478"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w godless|strong="H2611"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* harbor resentment; \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* binds \w them|strong="H7760"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cry|strong="H7768"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w help|strong="H7768"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5315"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w their|strong="H4191"\w* \w youth|strong="H5290"\w*, among \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w male|strong="H6945"\w* shrine \w prostitutes|strong="H6945"\w*.

God \w rescues|strong="H2502"\w* \w the|strong="H1540"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w* \w by|strong="H1540"\w* \w their|strong="H1540"\w* \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w* \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w opens|strong="H1540"\w* \w their|strong="H1540"\w* ears \w in|strong="H6041"\w* \w oppression|strong="H3906"\w*.

\w Indeed|strong="H3808"\w*, \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w drew|strong="H4390"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w jaws|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w distress|strong="H6862"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* spacious \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w broad|strong="H7338"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*, \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* richness.

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* now you \w are|strong="H7563"\w* laden \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w due|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*; \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w have|strong="H7563"\w* seized you.

\w Be|strong="H3588"\w* careful \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H6435"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* lures \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H2534"\w* riches; do \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w let|strong="H5186"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w large|strong="H7227"\w* \w bribe|strong="H3724"\w* lead \w you|strong="H3588"\w* astray.

\w Can|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w wealth|strong="H3808"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w mighty|strong="H3581"\w* \w effort|strong="H3581"\w* \w keep|strong="H6186"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H6186"\w* distress?

Do \w not|strong="H5927"\w* \w long|strong="H7602"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w when|strong="H5927"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w vanish|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H8478"\w* homes.

\w Be|strong="H3588"\w* \w careful|strong="H8104"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* iniquity, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* preferred \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w God|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7682"\w* \w in|strong="H3384"\w* \w His|strong="H3384"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w*. \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w teacher|strong="H3384"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w Him|strong="H3384"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w or|strong="H1870"\w* told \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*, ‘\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w done|strong="H6466"\w* \w wrong|strong="H5766"\w*’?

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w to|strong="H2142"\w* \w magnify|strong="H7679"\w* \w His|strong="H2142"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w*, \w which|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H7891"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w praised|strong="H7891"\w* \w in|strong="H2142"\w* \w song|strong="H7891"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* mankind \w has|strong="H3605"\w* \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w it|strong="H3605"\w*; \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w behold|strong="H2372"\w* \w it|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H7350"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w*.

\w Indeed|strong="H2005"\w*, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H8141"\w* \w great|strong="H7689"\w*—\w beyond|strong="H3808"\w* \w our|strong="H3045"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*; \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w His|strong="H3045"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w is|strong="H8141"\w* \w unsearchable|strong="H2714"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w draws|strong="H1639"\w* up \w drops|strong="H5198"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w distill|strong="H2212"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* \w from|strong="H1639"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* mist,

\w which|strong="H7227"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w* \w pour|strong="H5140"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H7227"\w* shower \w abundantly|strong="H7227"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* mankind.
Furthermore, who can understand how the \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* spread out, how the thunder roars from \w His|strong="H5645"\w* \w pavilion|strong="H5521"\w*?

\w See|strong="H2005"\w* how \w He|strong="H5921"\w* scatters \w His|strong="H5921"\w* lightning \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w covers|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w depths|strong="H8328"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H5414"\w* \w these|strong="H5971"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w judges|strong="H1777"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w provides|strong="H5414"\w* food \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w abundance|strong="H4342"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* fills \w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* lightning \w and|strong="H3709"\w* \w commands|strong="H6680"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w strike|strong="H6293"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w mark|strong="H6293"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* thunder \w declares|strong="H5046"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w presence|strong="H5921"\w*; \w even|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* \w regard|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rising|strong="H5927"\w* storm.
